name: Nakasendo_ Magome - Tsumago
description: Experience this 6.6-km point-to-point trail near Nakatsugawa Shi, Gifu. Generally considered a moderately challenging route, it takes an average of 2 h 13 min to complete. This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are October through November.

name: Nakasendo_ Nagiso - Magome

This is a very popular area for hiking and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring. The best times to visit this trail are September through November.
